Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utility
  • public abstract class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility is an abstract class that holds static methods with commonly used functionality. It does not define any fields, and should not be inherited from.
    Version:
    1.0, 18/02/20
    Author:
    Charles Wong, Cindy Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Utility()

    • Method Detail

      • drawCenteredCircle

        public static void drawCenteredCircle​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                      int x,
                                      int y,
                                      int r,
                                      java.awt.Color c)
        Draws a colored circle centered on a point.
        Parameters:
        g - a Graphics object
        x - x coordinate of the circle's center
        y - y coordinate of the circle's center
        r - radius of the circle
        c - the Color to be set

      • drawCenteredTextBox

        public static void drawCenteredTextBox​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                       int x,
                                       int y,
                                       java.lang.String str,
                                       java.awt.Color txtColor)
        Draws a text box horizontally centered on point. The y coordinate lines up with the baseline of the text. The color of the text can be changed, but the color of the underlying box cannot.
        Parameters:
        g - a Graphics object
        x - the x coordinate to be centered around
        y - the y coordinate of the baseline of text
        str - the string to be drawn
        txtColor - the Color of the text to be drawn

      • pointInCircle

        public static boolean pointInCircle​(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int r,
                                    int testX,
                                    int testY)
        Tests if a point is within a circle with center and radius.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the center of the circle
        y - y coordinate of the center of the circle
        r - radius of the circle
        testX - x coordinate of the point to be tested
        testY - y coordinate of the point to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the point is in the circle, false if not
